      • receiveRating

        public void receiveRating(int rating)
        Receives a rating and uses it to update the average rating Does not keep track of all ratings, uses a formula to update Formula does require number of ratings, but still uses less memory than array of all ratings
        Parameters:
        rating - the received rating

      • acceptsRequest

        public boolean acceptsRequest()
        Decides whether or not to accept a request Currently always true for ease of testing Can easily implement a Random if desired
        Returns:
        boolean representing whether or not the request is accepted
